name: 11th International Conference on Clinical Microbiology and Infectious Diseases
content: Conference Series LLC ltd is pleased to invite you to attend the “11th International Conference on Clinical Microbiology and Infectious Diseases” This event will be a gathering of hundreds of research minded people from the fields of microbiology and its related fields who belong from both Academics and Industries including young researchers/students etc. to share a common interest in “Euro Clinical Microbiology 2021” Theme: Emerging Challenges In Clinical Microbiology Please visit conference website for more details. Website: https://clinicalmicrobiology.insightconferences.com/ We look forward to seeing you in Tokyo, Japan in April 19-20, 2021! S. Laxmi, Conference Service Manager 47 Churchfield road, London W3 6AY +44-0-800-014-8923 Email: clinicalmicro@theexpertsmeet.com
